name: Weather-Related Construction Delays
description: Extended periods of severe weather causing construction delays and additional costs
likelihood_rationale: Historical weather data shows 40% chance of significant delays
impact_rationale: Based on previous projects with weather delays

name: Environmental Permitting Delays
description: Delays in obtaining environmental permits or unexpected environmental requirements
likelihood_rationale: 25% of similar projects experience permitting delays
impact_rationale: Additional studies and mitigation measures required

name: Equipment Delivery Delays
description: Late delivery of major equipment items (transformers, switchgear, conductors)
mitigation_strategy: Early procurement, backup suppliers, expediting clauses
likelihood_rationale: Supply chain disruptions common in recent years
impact_rationale: Schedule delays lead to extended overhead costs

name: Unfavorable Geotechnical Conditions
description: Poor soil conditions requiring enhanced foundation designs or access issues
likelihood_rationale: 20% of projects encounter unexpected soil conditions
impact_rationale: Enhanced foundations and access roads required

name: Skilled Labor Shortage
description: Shortage of qualified lineworkers and specialized technicians
mitigation_strategy: Early contractor selection, wage premiums, training programs
likelihood_rationale: Current tight labor market for utility construction
impact_rationale: Premium wages and extended schedules required

name: Right-of-Way Acquisition Delays
description: Delays or complications in acquiring necessary land rights and easements
mitigation_strategy: Early landowner engagement, eminent domain preparation
likelihood_rationale: 15% of projects face significant ROW challenges
impact_rationale: Legal proceedings and alternative routing costs

name: Scope Changes and Design Modifications
description: Client-requested changes or engineering-driven design modifications
likelihood_rationale: 50% of projects experience some scope changes

name: Material Price Escalation
description: Significant increases in steel, aluminum, and other material costs
mitigation_strategy: Fixed-price contracts, material hedging, early procurement
likelihood_rationale: High probability due to commodity market volatility
impact_rationale: Material costs represent significant project portion
